title: 12. Somebody Out There Is for You, He just Might Not Be It
description:
Hey Girl Hey!

 

I know it's been a minute since we chatted but I promise I'm back! In this week's episode we get into rejection, chasing the wrong guys, and why we shouldn't chase the guys who don't actually want us back.  Ready? Go ahead hit that play button!

 

Click here to get a free preview to my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
